ARABIC: وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and take the muminun who follow you under your wing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And take those believers under your wing who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and be meek to the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and be kind to your believing followers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And spread your wing of mercy for the believers following you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And be kind and humble to the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And be kind to him who follows you of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Lower thy wing to those who follow thee, being believers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lower thy wing (in kindness) unto those believers who follow thee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and extend kindness and affection to those of the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And lower thou thy Wlng Unto those who follow thee as believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and lower your wing to the faithful who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And lower thy wing to the Believers who follow thee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And be kind and humble to the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and lower your wing to the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And lower your wing to those of the believers who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And lower your wing to those who follow you of the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:215] And lower your wing, show your gentle side, to the believers, the affirmers of God’s Oneness, who follow you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lower thy wing (in kindness) unto those believers who follow thee) be kind to the believers.
